item.description:
A Ron Paul field office will open in Portsmouth this Saturday to Tuesday. We'll be making phone calls, Get Out The Vote door hanger and a place to get signs. It will be open Saturday, from 9am to 9pm, Sunday, from noon to 9pm, Monday, from 9am to 9pm, and Tuesday (Primary!), from 7am to 7pm.

Eric Brakey will be contact during the time. He can be reached at 207-406-0897; his email is ericb@ronpaul2012.com. Also, Brian Early, 603-769-0505, briane@ronpaul2012.com, will be in and out.
item.name: Portsmouth Ron Paul Field Office-- Saturday thru Primary
